entry.title: dotnet/runtime - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-01-13
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • JsonSerializer.Deserialize(... JsonSerializerContext context) Ignores configurations in JsonSerializerContext #80634
  • JIT: Assertion failed '!"Missing flags on tree"' during 'Assertion prop' for recently added RuntimeHelpers.CreateSpan uses #80632
    8.0.0
  • [6.0] AppleTV CI failures: Failure to launch simulator OR failure to authenticate request #80628
  • .NET 7 JIT Crash when referencing struct of particular shape: Fatal error. Internal CLR error. (0x80131506) #80624
  • [release/6.0] Close MsQuic after checking for QUIC support to free resources (#75521) #80623
    6.0.x
  • Interop Source Generator TFM check is very expensive #80621
    8.0.0
  • Skip dotnet CLI first run logic when executing tests #80619
  • Segfault on attempt to call a Profiler API method on Linux #80617
    8.0.0
  • JIT: Assertion failed 'GetLayout()->GetClassHandle() != NO_CLASS_HANDLE' during 'Morph - Global' #80616
  • Nested StreamWriter disposure #80606
  • HttpClientFactory holds onto exceptions indefinitely, despite a two-minute timer #80605
  • Dynamic static generic virtual method leftover work #80602
    8.0.0
  • Linq enumeration of a string's characters is twice as slow as enumerating them using string.ToCharArray() #80596
  • Test failure tracing/eventpipe/pauseonstart/pauseonstart/pauseonstart.sh #80594
    8.0.0
  • Proposal: evolve RyuJIT emitter to improve flexibility #80589
    Future
  • Possible ARM64 GC Hole - `JIT\\Regression\\JitBlue\\Runtime_64208\\Runtime_64208\\Runtime_64208.cmd` #80588
    8.0.0
  • Possible ARM64 GC Hole - `Loader\\classloader\\StaticVirtualMethods\\NegativeTestCases\\CuriouslyRecurringGenericWithUnimplementedMethod\\CuriouslyRecurringGenericWithUnimplementedMethod.cmd` #80587
  • Possible ARM64 GC Hole - `Loader\\CollectibleAssemblies\\ByRefLocals\\ByRefLocals\\ByRefLocals.cmd` #80586
    8.0.0
  • Possible ARM64 GC Hole - `Regressions\\coreclr\\GitHub_16833\\Test16833\\Test16833.cmd` #80585
    8.0.0
  • Possible ARM64 GC Hole - `JIT\\Regression\\JitBlue\\DevDiv_461649\\DevDiv_461649\\DevDiv_461649.cmd` #80584
    8.0.0
  • X86 Assert failure - `baseservices\\callconvs\\TestCallingConventions\\TestCallingConventions.cmd` #80583
    8.0.0
  • Possible ARM64 GC Hole - `JIT/HardwareIntrinsics/General/Vector256_1/Vector256_1_ro/Vector256_1_ro` #80582
    8.0.0

Closed

  • `Microsoft.Extensions.FileSystemGlobbing.Matcher` matches glob pattern `/*/` against file path `/a/b`, but it shouldn't. #80076
  • EventListener unloadability #80450
    8.0.0
  • Unity 2022.2.1f1 - System.Text.Json "no viable overloaded '='" #80525
  • `runtime-coreclr jitstress-isas-x86` pipeline failing on OSX x64 #80403
  • Unhandled exception causes docker container to hang on ARM64 #66707
    8.0.0
  • Cannot load project after update to 17.4 #78237
  • Socket connect with payload via SocketAsyncEventArgs fails #79654
    7.0.x
  • [6.0] Test failures on OSX: OSVersion_ValidVersion_OSX, CurrencyNegativePattern_Get_ReturnsExpected_ByLocale #80252
  • Binding collection is not working for options in .net 7.0.1 - it is working in version 7.0.0 and below #79904
    7.0.x
  • Fix interaction of PGO and partial compilation #66101
    Future
  • JIT: resolve issues with OSR and PGO #47942
    Future
  • Vector512 tests for llvmfullaot run out of trampoline type 3 #80467
  • SerialPort ReadByte() does not longer raise the documented TimeoutException (after timeout reached) #78319
  • Running .NET 7 single file binary on Apple M1 chip causes app to be "killed" #79267
    7.0.x
  • Replace compare + brtrue/brfalse pattern with binop conditional branch (`Unsafe.IsAddressLessThan`) #80608
  • Enable functional tests for Apple platforms to have a custom native main #80545
    8.0.0
  • POST requests on ARM64 hang until timeout #80491
  • [.NET 6] BufferFileStreamStrategy fills GC Finalizer Queue #78553
    6.0.x
  • Consider deleting enum support for bool as an underlying type from all runtimes #79224
    Future
  • Test failure JIT/opt/ValueNumbering/ExposedLocalsNumbering/ExposedLocalsNumbering.sh #80595
  • LinqString enumeration #80593
  • System.Diagnostics.Metrics.Tests.MetricEventSourceTests.EventSourceFiltersInstruments failing in CI (Outerloop) #79749
    8.0.0
  • PEReader doesn't work with "IsLoadedImage" and "PrefetchMetadata" options #76648
    Future
  • Is it possible for roslyn to support wasm as compiling target #77610
  • [API Proposal]: enum PARSE attribute #79699

PullRequests

Created

  • Fix NET 7.0 streamed http response reading #80638
    area-System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript, community-contribution
  • Update our inline observations to special case a few more intrinsics #80637
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.LdapConnection has wrong argument check (#78459) #80636
    area-System.DirectoryServices, community-contribution
  • Enable partial compilation of methods #80635
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Vectorize Enumerable.Range(...).ToArray() #80633
    area-System.Linq, community-contribution
  • [wasm] Remove forward slash in trimmer args #80631
    area-Build-mono
  • Fix GC hole in newly added test #80630
    area-System.Runtime.InteropServices, test-bug, 8.0.0
  • [PERF] Fix errors from lowercase OS names #80629
    area-Infrastructure, area-Infrastructure-mono, perf-pipeline
  • Fix some low-hanging HWIntrinsic issues #80626
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • JIT: maintain pred lists during loop unrolling #80625
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Set FieldSeq in CreateSpan for field handle #80622
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Avx512 upper regs callee #80620
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • [mono] Cleanup some unused functions/headers #80618
    area-VM-meta-mono
  • Ldp stp modifications flag #80614
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Add support for llvm linker (lld) #80613
    community-contribution, area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • [QUIC] Log msquic version and commit hash to event log and to test output. #80612
    area-System.Net.Quic
  • JIT: Streamline TreeLifeUpdater #80611
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Allow eliminating virtual methods on abstract classes #80607
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Add type loader support for resolving static virtuals #80601
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Generate fewer templates for generic virtual methods #80600
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Add additional IG assertion checking #80599
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [Draft] Test merging IL_Conformance #80597
    area-System.Reflection.Metadata

Merged

  • Dont produce ILLink packages from runtime til preview 2 #80627
    linkable-framework, area-Tools-ILLink, 8.0.0
  • Use weak handle for the back reference to EventProvider #80482
    area-Tracing-coreclr
  • Removing old variable debug info tracking system #80537
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [release/7.0] TarReader should dispose underlying stream if leaveOpen is false #80598
    Servicing-approved, area-System.Formats.Tar, 7.0.3
  • [release/6.0] [mono][debugger] Fix Debugger.Break() behavior when running on release mode #80615
    Servicing-approved, area-Debugger-mono, 6.0.14
  • [mono][aot] Simplify the dedup code. #80442
    area-Codegen-AOT-mono
  • [release/7.0] Remove ConcurrentDictionary from the shared JsonSerializerOptions cache implementation. #80576
    Servicing-approved, area-System.Text.Json, 7.0.3
  • delete enum support for bool as an underlying type #79962
    area-System.Runtime, community-contribution
  • Make some tests use single-file publish instead of bundler API #80603
    area-Single-File
  • Use ArgumentOutOfRangeException.ThrowIf helpers in more places #80355
    area-Meta
  • Use Roslyn support for RuntimeHelpers.CreateSpan (or field caching downlevel) #79461
    area-Meta
  • JIT: Enable edge based profiles for all scenarios #80481
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Emit mneg for mul+neg on Arm64 #79550
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Fixed Typo #80609
    area-System.Console, community-contribution
  • Have SIMD Load/Store use GT_IND and GT_ASG where possible #80411
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Enable specifying custom native main source with AppleAppBuilderTask #80546
    area-Infrastructure-mono
  • Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 679: Build ID 2087627 #80505
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • Dispose archive stream after the list of DataStreams #80572
    area-System.Formats.Tar, 8.0.0
  • [release/6.0][wasm] Partially fix issue caused during VS upgrade #79572
    Servicing-approved, arch-wasm, area-Build-mono, 6.0.14
  • [release/7.0] Fix Configuration to ensure calling the property setters. #80562
    Servicing-approved, area-Extensions-Configuration, 7.0.3
  • [wasm] Move microbenchmarks, and blazor SOD runs to net8.0 #80308
    arch-wasm, area-Infrastructure-mono, perf-pipeline
  • Fix security transparency issue #80478
    area-System.Diagnostics.Metric
  • PEReader doesn't work with "IsLoadedImage" and "PrefetchMetadata" options #80106
    area-System.Reflection.Metadata, community-contribution
  • Moving GetCurrentProcessorId() to shared #80532
    area-System.Threading
  • Make System.Collections.Immutable adhere to repo's var policy #80556
    area-System.Collections
  • Use MemoryExtensions.Equals in CharArrayHelpers.EqualsOrdinalAsciiIgnoreCase #80561
    area-System.Net.Http

Updated

  • Add logger and tests for xml parsing in NativeAOT #80470
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr, 8.0.0
  • [wasm] Set TrimMode=full for templates #80639
    area-Build-mono
  • WIP - NativeAOT for FreeBSD #80323
    os-freebsd, community-contribution, area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Implement Startup hooks support in Mono #80391
    area-VM-meta-mono
  • [mono][wasm] Bundle assemblies as WebCIL #79416
    arch-wasm, area-AssemblyLoader-mono
  • Refactoring store liveness update #80539
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Use SetupProperties to set properties related to NativeAOT and remove the top-level defaults #79233
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • [JIT] X64/ARM64 - `CAST` removals for small types on `ADD`, `SUB`, `MUL`, `AND`, `OR`, `XOR`, `NOT`, `NEG` #77874
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Enable AVX512 Additional 16 SIMD Registers #79544
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, arch-avx512
  • Add tests for exercising certificates with platform provider keys #80558
    area-System.Security
  • [API Implementation]: Deconstruct for DateTime, DateTimeOffset, DateOnly, and TimeOnly #79499
    new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution, area-System.DateTime
  • [tests] Stand up iOS arm runtime tests and enable tracing/eventpipe tests #79169
    area-Infrastructure-mono, runtime-mono
  • Implement DivRem intrinsic for X86 #66551
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, new-api-needs-documentation, 8.0.0
  • [wasm][icu] ICU files sharding + custom icu data loading for WASM #80421
    arch-wasm, area-System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript, 8.0.0
  • [wasm] Enable dedup by default. #80260
    area-Build-mono
  • [wasm][debugger] Implement support to symbolOptions from dap. #79284
    area-Debugger-mono, needs-author-action
  • Implement new `ComWrappers` APIs #80402
    area-Interop-coreclr, new-api-needs-documentation, 8.0.0
  • [mono][interp] Expand bblocks reordering with common patterns to facilitate propagation of values #80362
    area-Codegen-Interpreter-mono, 8.0.0
  • [release/7.0] Enforce HttpClient limits on GetFromJsonAsync #80553
    NO-MERGE, area-System.Net.Http, 7.0.x
  • [release/6.0] Enforce HttpClient limits on GetFromJsonAsync #80552
    NO-MERGE, area-System.Net.Http, 6.0.x
  • Prevent tests from importing "normal" NuGet props/targets #80573
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Add faster DAC EnumMemoryRegion option with less memory usage #79014
    NO-MERGE, area-Diagnostics-coreclr
  • Use TaskDialog for error dialog in Windows GUI apps #78087
    area-Host
  • Prefix exported symbols defined via EntryPoint of UnmanagedCallersOnl… #79880
    area-Codegen-AOT-mono
  • WIP: Implement native container types used by shared EventPipe code. #78852
    area-Tracing-coreclr
  • [TEST] DualModeSocketTest changes #80577
    NO-MERGE, NO-REVIEW
  • [mono] Introduce designated direct pinvokes to mono aot compiler #79721
    area-Codegen-AOT-mono
  • Replace successive "ldr" and "str" instructions with "ldp" and "stp" #77540
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • allow to set custom serial speed on Linux #80534
    os-linux, area-System.IO.Ports
  • [wasm] Conditionally disable `--allow-undefined` #80495
    arch-wasm, area-Build-mono, 8.0.0
  • [Android] Improvements to remote certificate verification in SslStream #77386
    area-System.Net.Security, os-android, 8.0.0
  • Rename RdXmlFile to _DirectivesFile #79926
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • JIT: Fix ordering of type initialization and stsfld #80485
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Changed handle table scanning so that we would scan all slots for any heap count we may have. #80541
    area-GC-coreclr
  • Strip all symbols on macOS as well #80515
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Set AssemblyName.ProcessorArchitecture for compatibility. #80581
    area-System.Reflection.Metadata
  • Initial work to port EventPipe library to NativeAOT #80382
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr

entry.title: dotnet/runtimelab - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-01-13
entry.content:
Issues

Updated

  • [NativeAOT-LLVM] Remove the workarounds for `Interop.GetRandomBytes`/`CalendarData.EnumCalendarInfo` #2095

PullRequests

Created

  • Fix most warnings for the `HelloWasm` runtime test #2168

Updated

  • [NativeAOT-LLVM] Exception handling: dispatch #2145

entry.title: dotnet/sdk - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-01-13
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • dotnet new -v displays exception #29937
  • dotnet build/pack generates no executable in NuGet Package #29935
  • Is System.drawing.common vulnerable to CVE-2021-24112 in .Net SDK 6.0 #29927
  • Running `dotnet watch` results in an error that says The specified task executable location "C:\Program Files\dotnet\sdk" is invalid #29922

Closed

  • restore/build/publish hanging on .NET > 6.0.401 #29662
  • dotnet test does no longer accept a project path after updating to NET 7.0.101 #29543

PullRequests

Created

  • Stable branding for 7.0.200 GA release #29942
    Area-Infrastructure
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/7.0.2xx' => 'main' #29940
    Area-Infrastructure
  • This call is failing on the Darwin leg in installer. (#29916) #29939
  • This call is failing on the Darwin leg in installer. (#29916) #29938
  • Introduce Dependabot for updatig the same dependecies used in dotnet/templating #29921
    Area-Infrastructure

Merged

  • Convert the DotnetCommand that call "new" to DotnetNewCommand #29923
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/7.0.1xx' => 'release/7.0.2xx' #29918
    Area-Infrastructure
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/7.0.2xx' => 'main' #29879
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Make PublishAot an optional feature because Mono does not support it. #28674
    Servicing-approved, Area-Infrastructure, 7.0.3
  • [release/7.0.2] add warning scrubber #29934
    Area-dotnet new
  • Add *.swp to gitignore template #29866
    Area-Infrastructure
  • [release/7.0.2xx] [Backport] Prevent `dotnet test` verbosity from being ignored #29557
    Area-Infrastructure
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/6.0.4xx' => 'release/7.0.1xx' #29894
    Area-Infrastructure

Updated

  • Add a PostAction to support modifying Json files in CLI templates #29880
  • Try not building the test assets and see what happens #29376
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Update GenerateLayout.targets for Microsoft.CodeAnalysis.NetAnalyzers packaging structure changes #29906
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Make `dotnet publish` use `Release` by default in 8.0+ Projects #29155
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Add support for new output path format #29599

entry.title: dotnet/csharplang - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-01-13
entry.content:
Issues

Updated

  • [Proposal] Required Properties #3630
    11.0
  • [Proposal]: Raw string literal #4304
    11.0
  • Proposal: Type aliases / abbreviations / newtype #410

Merged

entry.title: dotnet/roslyn - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-01-13
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Test plan for "collection literals" #66418
    C# 12.0
  • Can't run "Declare Public Members" codefix provider for newly added Syntax types. #66414
    17.5
  • Unusable Blazor analyzers blinking invalid RZ10012 Warnings in Visual Studio VS 17.4.4 (see video) #66413
  • High CPU Utilization with Very Basic Keypresses #66410
    17.6
  • Compiler reports error CS0618 'member' is obsolete even when the containing member is obsolete itself #66409
  • Test failed in CI: Microsoft.CodeAnalysis.Editor.CSharp.UnitTests.AddUsing.AddUsingTests.TestSimpleUnsortedUsings1(testHost: OutOfProcess) #66408

Closed

  • Bug: Using foreach, it's possible to accidentally mutate a ref readonly without any unsafe code #66135
    17.6
  • DocumentationCommentCompiler.GetDescription fails on net7.0 #65951
  • [C#] Stack Overflow when a method pointer type appears in an attribute #65594
    17.6

PullRequests

Created

  • Catch exceptions when doing I/O to read the generator file version #66422
    Area-IDE
  • Fix mismatched per-language option storages #66421
    Area-IDE
  • Fix DateTime item's description in different culture #66420
    Area-IDE
  • Initial support for collection literal parsing. #66417
    Area-Compilers
  • Ensure no extension method applies to System.Void #66416
    Area-Compilers
  • Initial syntax types for collection literals #66412
    Area-Compilers
  • Nullable annotations for DebugInfoInjector, DynamicAnalysisInjector #66411
    Area-Compilers
  • Take incremental nullability snapshot for local functions #66406
    Area-Compilers
  • Visit unreachable `when` clauses by `NullableWalker` #66405
  • Merge release/dev17.5-vs-deps to main #66404
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, Merge Conflicts
  • Introduce Parameter - Fix crash #66402
    Area-IDE

Merged

  • Emit defensive copy for constrained call on `in` parameter #66189
    Area-Compilers, Next
  • Improve our testing of DefaultAnalyzerAssemblyLoader #66356
    Area-Compilers, Next
  • Update Language Feature Status.md #66415
    Area-Compilers, Next
  • Add entry for RazorCompiler #66393
    Area-Infrastructure, Next
  • Revert "Do not copy nullable value type receiver of a constrained call." #66407
    Area-Compilers, Next
  • Report double storage warning for primary constructor parameters #66392
    Area-Compilers, New Feature - Primary Constructors
  • Move constants to RefSafetyAnalysis visitor #66097
    Area-Compilers, Next
  • Block `delegate*<void>...enum` constants in attributes #66073
    Area-Compilers, Next
  • Merge release/dev17.5 to release/dev17.5-vs-deps #66403
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Handle compiler diagnostics reported in .cshtml files during build #66355
    Area-IDE, Needs Shiproom Approval, area-web-frameworks
  • Fix reading VB editor options from ISettingsManager (17.5) #66396
    Area-IDE, OnDeckForQB, OnDeckForServicing
  • 17.5: Fix issue where Solution-Explorer symbol nodes collapse after a… #66400
    Area-IDE, OnDeckForQB
  • Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 327: Build ID 2087177 #66401

Updated

  • Allow specifying expected IL verification baseline #66316
    Area-Compilers
  • Emit copy when calling non-readonly method with ref readonly field receiver #66351
    Area-Compilers
  • Adding keyword recommendations after FileKeyword #66357
    Area-IDE, Community
  • Different behaviour of discard expression #66309
    Area-Compilers, Community, 17.6
  • Allow multiple documents in method debug info #66359
    Area-Interactive, Pending director approval
  • Apply diagnostic filter to generator failure warnings #66263
    Area-Compilers, 17.6
  • Fix line breaks between members when a property has an initializer #65924
    Area-Compilers, Community
  • Ensure event handler generation and navigation in webforms works properly #66394
    Area-IDE
  • Let LSP client know which diagnostics are build-only. #66329
    Area-IDE
  • Solution services cleanup #64160
    Area-IDE
  • Add test showing incorrect sequence point placement #66363
    Area-Compilers, Test
  • Treat `TypedReference` as managed #66328
    Area-Compilers, 17.6
  • Visit query lambda by `NullableWalker` even without conversion #66384
    Area-Compilers
  • Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 327: Build ID 2087588 #66287

entry.title: dotnet/aspnetcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-01-13
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Allow dev environments to auto-enable dev-centric features in "slim" host builder #46096
  • HubFilter should act the same way as an API middleware #46095
  • .Net Core Signal R Chat Client UI Options #46093
  • Blazor Custom elements with .net 7 Blazor Server not working properly #46091
  • Perf improvement: stage1publishaot #46090
  • Pseudo loc menu item appearing on project context menu (view in browser) #46089
  • Update "api" project template to use new methods on Random #46087
    8.0-preview2
  • Microsoft.NET.Sdk.Web should default to TrimMode=full #46084
  • Access-Control-Allow-Origin not added to response header #46083
  • Perf improvement: caching #46081
  • gRPC requests fail if made via nginx k8s ingress controller #46079
  • `Challenge` vs `ChallengeResult` #46076
  • [AOT] Annotate Microsoft.AspNetCore.Http.Results for trimming and AOT #46075

Closed

  • Add Project Template for an API application with minimal dependencies #45526
    8.0-preview1
  • Improvements to null state analysis on AuthorizationResult #45751
    8.0-preview1
  • .NET 7 Blocker - Method get_ServerSideSessions in type ApiAuthorizationDbContext from assembly IdentityServer does not have an implementation #46025
  • Microsoft.dotnet-openapi issue with whitespace character folder path #45893
  • Process terminated with error: Exception thrown from SocketAsyncEngine event loop #45988
  • PI proposal #46080
  • [AOT] Remove usage of System.Linq.Expressions #46014
  • Exception java.lang.NullPointerException: Attempt to invoke virtual method 'void #45315

PullRequests

Created

  • string.Split to Span.Split #46098
    Perf
  • Fix Blazor PageContext disposal #46097
    area-blazor
  • Add section to UpdatingMajorVersionAndTFM.md about marking APIs shipped #46088
  • Enumerate paramnames on startup #46086
    area-runtime, community-contribution
  • [AOT] Enable analysis and annotate Http.Results #46082
    area-web-frameworks
  • [release/7.0] Don't throw exception for unresolved type #46078
    area-runtime
  • Add DispatchExceptionAsync to ComponentBase #46074
    area-blazor, feature-rendering

Merged

  • Add new "api" project template that supports native AOT #46064
    area-mvc, 8.0-preview1
  • Adding a new rule for automating repro request comments #46094
    area-infrastructure, 8.0-preview1
  • Add nullable attribute to AuthorizationResult.Succeeded #46092
    area-security, community-contribution, 8.0-preview1
  • [release/7.0] Mark API as shipped #46042
    tell-mode, 7.0.3
  • Mark API from 7 as shipped #46069
    8.0-preview1
  • Set StaticFileOptions.OnPrepareResponse = CacheHeaderSettings.SetCacheHeaders for Blazor static files endpoint #46085
    area-blazor, 8.0-preview1
  • Move EmptyHttpResult to Http.Abstractions #46077
    area-runtime, area-web-frameworks, 8.0-preview1
  • Don't throw exception for unresolved type #46070
    area-runtime, 8.0-preview1
  • [AOT] Add expression free request filter pipeline for RequestDelegate #46020
    area-web-frameworks, 8.0-preview1

Updated

  • Update tests to reflect change of web app manifest extension in React C# template #43765
    area-mvc, community-contribution
  • Wrong replication of resource names in embedded file provider #46067
    area-mvc, community-contribution
  • [Blazor WebAssembly] Change web app manifest extension to “webmanifest” #43756
    area-mvc, community-contribution, .NET 8 Planning
  • Adding STJ Polymorphism to Result Types #46008
    area-web-frameworks
  • Making `JsonOptions` AOT/Trimmer-safe with EnsureJsonTrimmability switch #45886
  • Run test on Linux and Mac #45642
    area-infrastructure, community-contribution
  • Add IRateLimiterStatisticsFeature with default implementation and tests #46028
    area-runtime, community-contribution
  • Flags enum provided as list #46049
    community-contribution, area-web-frameworks
  • Caching.StackExchangeRedis: add "force reconnect" pattern #45261
  • Bump json5 from 2.2.1 to 2.2.3 in /src/Components/Web.JS #45864
    area-blazor, javascript, feature-blazor-native-dependencies
  • Enable setting ServerTimeout and KeepAliveInterval in HubConnectionBuilder #46065
    area-signalr
  • Improve Win bundle installers' UI #45935
    area-infrastructure, feature-installers

entry.title: dotnet/diagnostics - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-01-13
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Segfault when attaching twice #3600

entry.title: dotnet/efcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-01-13
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • EF Core Cosmos query on owned child collection (simple question) #30064
  • how to override like or contain operator in sqlite ? #30063
  • KeyNotFoundException on nullable nested object in JSON column if that object does not exist. #30062
  • Make it easier for library authors to integrate with an existing DbContext #30061
  • RelationalEntityTypeExtensions.GetDefaultTableName should return null for abstract types in a TPC hierarchy #30060
  • EFCore 7.0.2 Bug - Invalid Operation Exception RE "Temporary Value" #30059
  • Non-empty second migration in TPC scheme using inheritance #30058
  • Migrations slow build after upgrading from .NET Core 3.1 to .NET 6 #30057
  • Keyless type with property that looks like collection navigation does not fail model validation #30056
  • Nested Entities coming as null on reading using EF core 6 with Azure Cosmos DB #30055
  • Can the default type mappings be customized for Scaffold-DbContext? #30054
  • EF7 duplicates entities and throws exception on triple nested relationship #30053
  • Combination of `GroupBy`, `FirstOrDefault` and `Select` throws a KeyNotFoundException #30052
  • Unable to load mod_spatialite extension into sqlite connection on .NET 7 #30051
  • After running the Cli the many to many tables are missing. #30050
  • EF Core slower than EF 6 #30048

PullRequests

Created

  • Use precision/scale facets instead of store type when reverse engineering #30049

Merged

  • [release/7.0] Take schema into account when comparing FK constraints. #30047
    Servicing-approved, 7.0.3

Updated

  • Sequence cache support #29716
  • Bump Mono.TextTemplating from 2.2.1 to 2.3.1 #29462
    area-infrastructure, type-dependency update :arrow_up_small:
  • Allow opting out of RETURNING/OUTPUT clauses in SaveChanges #29917
